verses.verse: <S%H7065>Don't<s%> be envious of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H582>men;<s%> neither desire to be with <S%H183>them:<s%>
for their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H1897>plot<s%> <S%H7701>violence,<s%> and their <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> about <S%H5999>mischief.<s%>
Through <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H1129>built;<s%> by <S%H8394>understanding<s%> it is <S%H3559>established;<s%>
by <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H2315>rooms<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> with all <S%H3368>rare<s%> and <S%H5273>beautiful<s%> <S%H1952>treasure.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> has great <S%H3581>power;<s%> and a <S%H1847>knowledgeable<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H553>increases<s%> <S%H3581>strength;<s%>
for by wise <S%H8458>guidance<s%> you <S%H6213>wage<s%> your <S%H4421>war;<s%> and <S%H8668>victory<s%> is in <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3289>advisors.<s%>
<S%H2454>Wisdom<s%> is too <S%H7311>high<s%> for a <S%H191>fool:<s%> he <S%H6605>doesn't<s%> open his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
One who <S%H2803>plots<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%> will be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4209>a<s%> <S%H1167>schemer.<s%>
The <S%H2154>schemes<s%> of <S%H200>folly<s%> are <S%H2403>sin.<s%> The <S%H3887>mocker<s%> is <S%H8441>detested<s%> by <S%H120>men.<s%>
If you <S%H7503>falter<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> your <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H6862>small.<s%>
<S%H5337>Rescue<s%> those who are being <S%H3947>led<s%> away to <S%H4194>death!<s%> <S%H2820>Indeed,<s%> hold back those who are <S%H4131>staggering<s%> to the <S%H2027>slaughter!<s%>

If you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3045>"Behold,<s%> we didn't know <S%H8505>this;<s%>" doesn't he who weighs the <S%H3826>hearts<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H5341>it?<s%> He who keeps your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> he know <S%H7725>it?<s%> Shall he not render to every <S%H120>man<s%> according to his <S%H6467>work?<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> for it is <S%H2896>good;<s%> the droppings of the <S%H5317>honeycomb,<s%> which are <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to your <S%H2441>taste:<s%>

so you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> to be to your <S%H5315>soul;<s%> if you have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3426>it,<s%> then there will be a <S%H319>reward,<s%> your <S%H8615>hope<s%> will not be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
<S%H693>Don't<s%> lay in wait, <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5116>man,<s%> against the habitation of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> <S%H7703>Don't<s%> destroy his resting <S%H7258>place:<s%>
for a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H5307>falls<s%> seven <S%H7651>times,<s%> and rises up <S%H6965>again;<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H3782>overthrown<s%> by <S%H7451>calamity.<s%>
<S%H8055>Don't<s%> rejoice when your <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H5307>falls.<s%> <S%H3820>Don't<s%> let your heart be <S%H1523>glad<s%> when he is <S%H3782>overthrown;<s%>
lest <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7489>it,<s%> and it displease <S%H7725>him,<s%> and he turn away his wrath from <S%H639>him.<s%>
<S%H2734>Don't<s%> fret yourself because of <S%H7489>evildoers;<s%> neither be <S%H7065>envious<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%>
for there will be no <S%H319>reward<s%> to the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5216>man;<s%> and the lamp of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be snuffed <S%H1846>out.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and the <S%H4428>king.<s%> <S%H6148>Don't<s%> join those who are <S%H8138>rebellious:<s%>
for their <S%H343>calamity<s%> will <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly;<s%> the <S%H6365>destruction<s%> from them <S%H8147>both<s%>—who <S%H3045>knows?<s%>
These also are sayings of the <S%H2450>wise.<s%> To <S%H6440>show<s%> <S%H5234>partiality<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is not <S%H2896>good.<s%>
He who <S%H559>says<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> "You are <S%H6662>righteous;<s%>" <S%H5971>peoples<s%> shall <S%H5344>curse<s%> <S%H5971>him,<s%> and nations shall abhor <S%H2194>him<s%>—
but it will go <S%H5276>well<s%> with those who <S%H3198>convict<s%> the <S%H2896>guilty,<s%> and a rich <S%H1293>blessing<s%> will come on <S%H935>them.<s%>
<S%H7725>An<s%> <S%H5228>honest<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%> is like a <S%H5401>kiss<s%> on the <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
<S%H3559>Prepare<s%> your <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> and get your <S%H7704>fields<s%> <S%H6257>ready.<s%> <S%H310>Afterwards,<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> your <S%H1004>house.<s%>
<S%H5707>Don't<s%> be a witness against your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> without <S%H2600>cause.<s%> <S%H6601>Don't<s%> deceive with your <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
<S%H559>Don't<s%> say, "I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as he has <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7725>me;<s%> I will render to the <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H6467>work.<s%>"
I <S%H5674>went<s%> by the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H376>sluggard,<s%> by the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding;<s%>

<S%H5927>Behold,<s%> it was all grown over with <S%H7063>thorns.<s%> Its <S%H6440>surface<s%> was <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H2738>nettles,<s%> and its <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H1444>wall<s%> was broken <S%H2040>down.<s%>
Then I <S%H2372>saw,<s%> and considered <S%H7896>well.<s%> I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4148>instruction:<s%>
a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep;<s%>
so your <S%H7389>poverty<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> as a <S%H1980>robber,<s%> and your <S%H4270>want<s%> as an <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
